DOC.brief_summary: A Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy Ombitasvir/Paritaprevir/Ritonavir Dasabuvir Ribavirin Adults Genotype 1 Ombitasvir/Paritaprevir/Ritonavir Ribavirin Adults Genotype 4 Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Infection Decompensated Cirrhosis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy Ombitasvir/Paritaprevir/Ritonavir Dasabuvir With Ribavirin Adults With Genotype 1 Ombitasvir/Paritaprevir/Ritonavir With Ribavirin Adults With Genotype 4 Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Infection Decompensated Cirrhosis
DOC.criteria: 1 . HCV Genotype 1 ( GT1 ) Genotype 4 ( GT4 ) infection define : Positive antiHCV Ab , HCV RNA > 1,000 IU/mL laboratory result indicate HCV GT1 infection Screening . 2 . Evidence cirrhosis prior liver biopsy , FibroScan radiograph ( i.e. , CT MRI ) . 3 . ChildPugh Score 7 9 inclusive time Screening . 1 . Women pregnant breastfeeding . 2 . Positive test result Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HbsAg ) antiHIV antibody ( HIV Ab ) . 3 . Prior current use investigational commercially available antiHCV agent interferon/RBV and/or pegylated interferon ( pegIFN ) /RBV ( include limit telaprevir , boceprevir , sofosbuvir simeprevir ) . 4 . Confirmed presence hepatocellular carcinoma indicate image technique compute tomography ( CT ) scan magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) within 3 month prior Screening ultrasound perform Screening ( positive ultrasound result confirm CT scan MRI ) . 5 . Any current past evidence ChildPugh C classification .
